I tried a bunch of times and couldn't figure out why this was the only disc in thousands that wouldn't load, when it looks brand new and I have very scratched discs that still load ok. Then I read all these comments,this copy of Alice must have ruined the whole disc of movies. Let's get another copy rolling. It's a shame when a substandard copy of a movie becomes the most seeded.
